title: The Bitcoin War | with Vin Armani
description:
Vin Armani (Cyprian) is a philosopher, entrepreneur, author and recently converted Orthodox Christian. He’s a Bitcoin developer and the author of a book called “Render Unto Caesar: Prophecy, Profit, and Proof of Work in the Dim Age”: https://www.amazon.com/Render-Unto-Caesar-Prophecy-Profit/dp/B08WZMB83J

In this interview we go more in depth about what makes Bitcoin unique, its metaphysical underpinnings, the threats and opportunities around digital currency, its surrounding narratives and Cyprian’s own journey to Orthodoxy.

======================

Timestamps:
00:00:00 - Introduction
00:01:02 - How Jonathan got involved in Bitcoin
00:02:17 - How Vin got involved in Bitcoin
00:09:00 - The metaphysical underpinnings of Bitcoin
00:13:12 - The 2 narratives around Bitcoin
00:18:46 - The seed of corruption: NGU (Numbers Go Up)
00:21:45 - Digital scarcity
00:27:26 - What role do you see Bitcoin playing?
00:30:43 - The key advantage: proof of work
00:36:31 - Why the media attacks proof of work
00:42:37 - Security & stability
00:45:26 - Created by an anonymous person
00:48:37 - CBDC (Central Bank Digital Currency)
00:57:28 - How did this lead you to Orthodoxy?
01:08:27 - Bitcoin and the Genesis narrative
01:15:53 - Outro & Jonathan using Bitcoin

======================
